Room.Name: Red Room
Room.ShortDescription: You are in Madame Ruthie's private chambers.
Room.LongDescription: There are no frills here, just a stout bed and several strong wooden chairs with a makeup table and mirror against one wall. An open closet is stuffed with furs, long gowns and silks. Only long-time friends of the madame ever see the inside of this room. Are you one of her oldest friends?
